articles.title: Strictly's Will Mellor reveals he wants to win Glitterball Trophy for his mother - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Coronation Street actor, 46, has made it to the semi-finals of Strictly Come Dancing alongside his professional dance partner Nancy Xu.
articles.content:
Will Mellor has revealed he wants to win this year's Glitterball Trophy so that he can hand it straight over to his mother Shirley.

articles.title: Triangle of Sadness takes four top prizes at European film awards - The Guardian
articles.description: Ruben Ostlund’s Palme d’Or-winning satire takes best picture, director, actor and screenplay at continent’s answer to the Oscars
articles.content: It was plain sailing at this years European film awards in Reykjavík for Triangle of Sadness, Ruben Ostlunds luxury yacht-set satire of western entitlement and self-regard, which won best film as wel… [+6055 chars]
